text: <@U03FJQPSC0Y> <@U05KNCMAE7N> Has anyone suggested an icon component? There's a few peppered through the CRM that I think would be a nice component to be able to incorporate into an extension. Screenshot of two icons (I think there's a third one... yellow warning icon) that are shown on the import page when when mapping properties to column headers. Not crucial but would definitely be nice to see.
Thanks <@U04RDS77QF7>. These are great examples! We are looking into Icons and this information is helpful:slightly_smiling_face:

Serverless is good for inbedded to HubSpot yes.
I think in the case we have here unnecessary to a certain point.
In the case of RFE (Request for Estimates) it is a one way path into our estimators queue.
I don't think there is any problem with the iframe or its location. I was just wondering if it was possible for it to be loaded directly to the card instead of the floating div modal.
It works in both instances the same, I think just asthetics.

Hello everyone! The much awaited component is here:tada: Introducing our new *<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extension-components#panel|Panel component>* now available for our React-based custom cards. <https://github.com/HubSpot/ui-extensions-examples/tree/main/multi-step-flow|Here is a sample> to show you how this works (GIF below: see how we augmented our earlier "Gift a Meal sample")

*What is a Panel?* A component that will slide open over the main page, giving you more space to present detailed information. It can abstract information, perform data-related actions, avoid crowding the main page, and much more. (Pro tip: Tables & Forms :orange_heart: Panels)

A huge thank you to all the participants of our alpha - your input was very valuable in shaping this component:orange_heart: As always, if you have any feedback / comments / issues please do reach out. Happy panel-ling:rocket::party_gopher:
<@U06ALUC4HMZ> I'd recommend taking a look at <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extension-components#panel|Panel component> here :slightly_smiling_face:
<@U05KNCMAE7N> not sure what the panel component has to do with row height options in tables.... I freaking love the panel component but this seems like a separate problem
Oh, that's an idea! I ended up with another work around, but if I need more space that looks like a solid option. Thanks! <@U05KNCMAE7N>

:mega: :tada: :balloon: *<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Tips-Tricks-Best-Practices/Reimagining-CRM-records-show-us-your-customization-superpowers/m-p/914568#M7827|Reimagining CRM records â€“ show us your customization superpowers!>* is a super-cool *community-led initiative* by <@U032ZQJ8DNW> . It would be lovely to see some of active developers here showcasing their record page customizations!
